title: 92 60 15 "Face Off""Alabasta's Hero and a Ballerina on the Ship!"Transliteration: "Arabasuta no eiyū to senjō no barerīna" (Japanese:アラバスタの英雄と船上のバレリーナ) Yuji Endo Junki Takegami December 9, 2001(2001-12-09)[26] February 18, 2006[27]
